snippet: In a story Feb. 23 about Sammy Hagar at the South Beach Wine and Food Festival, The Associated Press reported erroneously that Hagar is the current lead singer of Van Halen. He is the former lead singer....
lead_paragraph: In a story Feb. 23 about Sammy Hagar at the South Beach Wine and Food Festival, The Associated Press reported erroneously that Hagar is the current lead singer of Van Halen. He is the former lead singer.
